>>===== MODE =====>>
citation
<<===== MODE =====<<



>>===== RESULT =====>>
BoGUS (Bureau of Gaseous Unformed Stuff)
<<===== RESULT =====<<

>>== ABBREVIATIONS ==>>
{
    "default": {
        "institution-part": {
            "Bureau of Gaseous Unformed Stuff": "BoGUS"
        }
    }
}
<<== ABBREVIATIONS ==<<


>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.1mlz1"
      default-locale="en">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <names variable="author">
        <name/>
        <institution institution-parts="short-long">
          <institution-part name="long" if-short="true" prefix=" (" suffix=")"/>
        </institution>
      </names>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "author": [
            {
                "literal": "Bureau of Gaseous Unformed Stuff"
            }
        ], 
        "type": "book"
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
